tasks.fallback_button_incorrect: Turn the water on higher to force it down

steps.description: Place the food inside the microwave.

steps.description: Close the door and set the time.

steps.description: Press the 'Start' button.
steps.image_prompt: Step 3: A close-up illustration of a finger pressing the 'Start' button, with the microwave light turning on inside. 16:9 aspect ratio, action shot.

tasks.user_task: 이미지를 보고 "Graduation" 문장을 명확히 발음하기
tasks.target_image_prompt: A graduation cap and diploma. A highly detailed, professional documentary-style photograph. Strictly photorealistic, captured with a DSLR camera, 85mm lens. The subject must be isolated and extremely clear, with a soft, out-of-focus background (bokeh) to completely eliminate any visual clutter or distractions. Bright, natural, and true-to-life lighting.
tasks.initial_prompt: What do you call the ceremony when you finish school or a program?
tasks.hint_1: It is a special event when you complete a course or therapy.
